descriptionHtml:
[heading][color=cyan]IMAGINATOR - MCMenu[/color][/heading]

[heading][color=cyan]Description[/color][/heading]
Not a whole lot to explain. I didn't much enjoy the dialogue-based config of imaginator, so made this menu for myself and decided to share when seeing the demand for it on the mod's respective thread.

Should the original authors decide to update the mod and implement it themselves - or even use some parts of the script in this mod, I'll gladly remove it from Nexus.

Note: It is advised to reset your settings from the dialogue menu before using the MCM values.

[heading][color=cyan]Requirements[/color][/heading]
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org]Skyrim Script Extender 1.6.13[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3863]SkyUI 3.4 for MCM[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13049]IMAGINATOR - Visual Control Device for Skyrim V1C[/url]

[heading][color=cyan]Credits[/color][/heading][list]
[*]The SKSE Team.
[*]ElminsterAU, Zilav and Sharlikran: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25859]TES5Edit[/url].
[*]MyGoodEye and Gopher: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13049]IMAGINATOR - Visual Control Device for Skyrim[/url].
[*]meh.[/list]

[heading][color=cyan]Disclaimer[/color][/heading]
This mod requires SKSE, which is currently in Beta. You may need to update SKSE at some future date.

This file is provided as is and the author holds no responsiblity for anything that may come to happen from using this file.
author: vivanto

files.name: IMAGINATOR - MCMenu101
files.changelogHtml: Brightness, Contrast and Saturation now can be set on a range of -100 -> +100
